name: Tactical Chronicle
description: Prescribe tactics and lead your army to victory over the fearsome demon lord in this epic tactical adventure. Journey across a rich, expansive world and fight for valor and glory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
